00026 /* usefull numbers */
00027 #define HBAR   1.054588754e-22 /* J / ps */
00028 #define BOLTS  1.38065812e-23 /* J/K */
00029 #define AECONV (315773.218)   /* au -> Kelvin */
00030 #define ALCONV (.529177249)   /* au -> Angstroms */
00031 #define LCONV  (1./.529177249)
00032 #define LCONV3 (LCONV*LCONV*LCONV)
00033 #define PCONV  (138.0622/1.01325)  /* K/A^3 -> atm */
00034 #define ECONV  (315777.0) /*is not correct in last place*/
00035 #define KCAL   (503.22289)   /*K->KCAL */
00036 #define DIM    (3)         /* DIMENSION */
00037 #define UNIT_CONV (2./3.)
00038 #define CCONV  (167102.4) /* Jm/C^2 to K A /e^2 */
00039 #define VCONV  (11604.4465) /* J/C to K/e */
00040 #define DCONV  (BOLTS*1.e23) /* convert K ps^2/A^5 -> g/cc 
00041                                which is just the boltzman constant* 10^23!*/
00042 #define CSPEED (2.99792458e6) /* A/ps */
00043 #define MCONV  (10./(6.022045*DCONV)) /* g/mol -> K ps^2/A^2 */
00044 
00045 #define FCONV (1.e8/(2.*M_PI*CSPEED)) /* ps-1 -> cm^-1 */
00046 
00047 #ifndef DBL_MAX
00048 #define DBL_MAX         1.7976931348623157E+308  /* max decimal */
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 #define ERRMAX (1e-10)
00052 #ifndef M_PI
00053 #define M_PI     3.14159265358979323846
00054 #endif
